Verses: 1 ivaigalukkuppinbu Yesu Thiberiyaakkadal Ennappatta Galileyaak Kadalin Akkaraikkup Ponaar.
2 avar Vyaadhikkaararidaththil Seydha Arpudhangalaith Thiralaana Janangal Kandapadiyaal Avarukkup Pinsendraargal.
3 yesu Malaiyinmel Eri, Ange Thammudaiya Seesharudanekooda Utkaarndhaar.
4 appozhudhu Yoodharudaiya Pandigaiyaagiya Paskaa Sameebamaayirundhadhu.
5 yesu Thammudaiya Kangalai Ereduththu, Thiralaana Janangal Thammidaththil Varugiradhaik Kandu, Pilippuvai Nokki: Ivargal Saappidaththakkadhaaga Appangalai Enge Kollalaam Endru Kettaar.
6 thaam Seyyappogiradhai Arindhirundhum, Avanai Sodhikkumpadi Ippadik Kettaar.
7 pilippu Avarukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga, Ivargalil Ovvoruvan Konjankonjam Eduththukkondaalum, Irunooru Panaththu Appangalum Ivargalukkup Podhaadhe Endraan.
8 appozhudhu Avarudaiya Seeshariloruvanum, Seemon Pedhuruvin Sagodharanumaagiya Andhireyaa Avarai Nokki:
9 inge Oru Paiyan Irukkiraan, Avan Kaiyil Aindhu Vaarkodhumai Appangalum Irandu Meengalum Undu, Aanaalum Avaigal Iththanai Janangalukku Emmaaththiram Endraan.
10 yesu : Janangalai Utkaaravaiyungal Endraar. Andha Idam Migundha Pullulladhaayirundhadhu. Pandhiyirundha Purushargal Erakkuraiya Aiyaayiram Peraayirundhaargal.

11 yesu Andha Appangalai Eduththu, Sthoththirampanni, Seeshargalidaththil Koduththaar; Seeshargal Pandhiyirundhavargalukkuk Koduththaargal; Appadiye Meengalaiyum Avar Eduththu Avargalukku Vendiya Mattum Koduththaar.
12 avargal Thrupthiyadaindhapinbu, Avar Thammudaiya Seeshargalai Nokki: Ondrum Sedhamaaip Pogaadhapadikku Meedhiyaana Thunikkaigalai Serththuvaiyungal Endraar.
13 andhappadiye Avargal Serththu, Vaarkodhumai Appangal Aindhil Avargal Saappittu Meedhiyaana Thunikkaigalinaale Pannirandu Koodaigalai Nirappinaargal.
14 yesu Seydha Arpudhaththai Andha Manushar Kandu: Meyyaagave Ivar Ulagaththil Varugiravaraana Theerkkadharisi Endraargal.
15 aadhalaal Avargal Vandhu, Thammai Raajaavaakkumpadip Pidiththukkondupoga Manadhaayirukkiraargalendru Yesu Arindhu, Marupadiyum Vilagi, Thaniye Malaiyinmel Erinaar.
16 saayangaalamaanapodhu Avarudaiya Seeshargal Kadarkaraikkup Poi,
17 padavil Eri, Kadalin Akkaraiyilulla Kapparnakoomukku Neraaipponaargal; Appozhudhu Iruttaayirundhadhu, Yesu Vum Avargalidaththil Varaadhirundhaar.
18 perunkaatru Adiththapadiyinaale Kadal Kondhalindhadhu.
19 avargal Erakkuraiya Moondru Naalu Maildhooram Thanduvaliththup Ponapozhudhu, Yesu Kadalinmel Nadandhu, Padavukku Sameebamaai Varugiradhaikkandu Bayandhaargal.
20 avargalai Avar Nokki: Naandhaan, Bayappadaadhirungal Endraar.
21 appozhudhu Avaraip Padavil Etrikkolla Manadhaayirundhaargal; Udane Padavu Avargal Pogira Karaiyaip Pidiththadhu.

22 marunaalil Kadalin Akkaraiyile Nindra Janangal Avarudaiya Seeshar Erina Andha Ore Padavuthavira Ange Veroru Padavum Irundhadhillaiyendrum, Yesu Thammudaiya Seesharudanekoodap Padavil Eraamal Avarudaiya Seeshar Maaththiram Ponaargalendrum Arindhaargal.
23 karththar Sthoththiranseydhapinbu Avargal Appam Saappitta Idaththukku Sameebamaaith Thiperiyaavilirundhu Vere Padavugal Vandhadhu.
24 appozhudhu Yesuvum Avarudaiya Seesharum Ange Illaadhadhai Janangal Kandu, Udane Andhap Padavugalil Eri, Yesuvaith Thedikkondu, Kapparnakoomukku Vandhaargal.
25 kadalin Akkaraiyile Avargal Avaraik Kandapodhu: Rabee, Neer Eppozhudhu Ivvidam Vandheer Endru Kettaargal.

26 yesu Avargalukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Neengal Arpudhangalaik Kandadhinaal Alla, Neengal Appam Pusiththuth Thrupthiyaanadhinaaleye Ennaith Thedugireergalendru Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.

27 azhindhupogira Pojanaththirkaaga Alla, Niththiyajeevanvaraikkum Nilainirkira Pojanaththirkaagave Kiriyai Nadappiyungal; Adhai Manushakumaaran Ungalukkuk Koduppaar; Avaraip Pidhaavaagiya Dhevan Muththiriththirukkiraar Endraar.
28 appozhudhu Avargal Avarai Nokki Dhevanukketra Kiriyaigalai Nadappikkumpadi Naangal Enna Seyyavendum Endraargal.
29 yesu Avargalukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Avar Anuppinavarai Neengal Visuvaasippadhe Dhevanukketra Kiriyaiyaayirukkiradhu Endraar.
30 adharku Avargal: Appadiyaanaal Ummai Visuvaasikkumpadikku Naangal Kaanaththakkadhaaga Neer Enna Adaiyaalaththaik Kaanbikkireer? Ennaththai Nadappikkireer?
31 vaanaththilirundhu Avargalukku Appaththaip Pusikkakkoduththaar Endru Ezhudhiyirukkirapadi, Nammudaiya Pidhaakkal Vanaandharaththil Mannaavaip Pusiththaargale Endraargal.

32 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Vaanaththilirundhu Vandha Appaththai Mose Ungalukkuk Kodukkavillai; En Pidhaavo Vaanaththilirundhu Vandha Meyyaana Appaththai Ungalukkuk Kodukkiraar Endru, Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren
33 vaanaththilirundhirangi, Ulagaththukku Jeevanaik Kodukkira Appame Dhevan Aruliya Appam Endraar.
34 appozhudhu Avargal Avarai Nokki: Aandavare, Indha Appaththai Eppozhudhum Engalukkuth Tharavendum Endraargal.
35 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Jeeva Appam Naane, Ennidaththil Varugiravan Orukkaalum Pasiyadaiyaan, Ennidaththil Visuvaasamaayirukkiravan Orukkaalum Thaagamadaiyaan.
36 neengal Ennaik Kandirundhum Visuvaasiyaamalirukkireergal Endru Ungalukku Sonnen.
37 pidhaavaanavar Enakkuk Kodukkira Yaavum Ennidaththil Varum, Ennidaththil Varugiravanai Naan Purambe Thalluvadhillai.
38 en Siththaththinpadiyalla, Ennai Anuppinavarudaiya Siththaththinpadi Seyyave Naan Vaanaththilirundhirangivandhen.
39 avar Enakkuth Thandhavaigalil Ondraiyum Naan Izhandhupogaamal, Kadaisinaalil Avaigalai Ezhuppuvadhe Ennai Anuppina Pidhaavin Siththamaayirukkiradhu.

40 kumaaranaik Kandu, Avaridaththil Visuvaasamaayirukkiravan Evano Avan, Niththiyajeevanai Adaivadhum, Naan Avanaik Kadaisinaalil Ezhuppuvadhum, Ennai Anuppinavarudaiya Siththamaayirukkiradhu Endraar.
41 naan Vaanaththilirundhu Vandha Appam Endru Avar Sonnadhinimiththam Yoodhargal Avaraikkuriththu Murumuruththu:
42 ivan Yoseppin Kumaaranaagiya Yesu Allavaa, Ivanudaiya Thagappanaiyum Thaayaiyum Arindhirukkirome; Appadiyirukka, Naan Vaanaththilirundhirangi Vandhen Endru Ivan Eppadi Sollugiraan Endraargal.
43 yesu Avargalukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Ungalukkulle Murumurukkavendaam.
44 ennai Anuppina Pidhaa Oruvanai Izhuththukkollaavittaal Avan Ennidaththil Varamaattaan; Kadaisinaalil Naan Avanai Ezhuppuven.
45 ellaarum Dhevanaale Podhikkappattiruppaargal Endru Theerkkadharisigalin Aagamaththil Ezhudhiyirukkiradhe; Aagaiyaal Pidhaavinidaththil Kettuk Katrukkollugiravan Evanum Ennidaththil Varugiraan.
46 dhevanidaththinindru Vandhavare Thavira Veroruvarum Pidhaavaik Kandadhillai, Ivare Pidhaavaik Kandavar.
47 ennidaththil Visuvaasamaayirukkiravanukku Niththiyajeevan Undendru Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
48 jeeva Appam Naane.
49 ungal Pidhaakkal Vanaandharaththile Mannaavaip Pusiththirundhum Mariththaargal
50 idhile Pusikkiravan Mariyaamalirukkumpadi Vaanaththilirundhirangina Appam Idhuve.
51 naane Vaanaththilirundhirangina Jeeva Appam; Indha Appaththaip Pusikkiravan Endrendraikkum Pizhaippaan; Naan Kodukkum Appam Ulagaththin Jeevanukkaaga Naan Kodukkum En Maamsame Endraar.
52 appozhudhu Yoodhargal; Ivan Thannudaiya Maamsaththai Eppadi Namakkup Pusikkak Koduppaan Endru Thangalukkulle Vaakkuvaadhampanninaargal.

53 adharku Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Manushakumaaranudaiya Maamsaththaip Pusiyaamalum, Avarudaiya Raththaththaip Paanampannaamalum Irundhaal Ungalukkulle Jeevanillai Endru Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
54 en Maamsaththaip Pusiththu, En Raththaththaip Paanampannugiravanukku Niththiyajeevan Undu; Naan Avanaik Kadaisinaalil Ezhuppuven.
55 en Maamsam Meyyaana Bojanamaayirukkiradhu, En Raththam Meyyaana Paanamaayirukkiradhu.
56 en Maamsaththaip Pusiththu, En Raththaththaip Paanam Pannugiravan Ennile Nilaiththirukkiraan, Naanum Avanile Nilaiththirukkiren.
57 jeevanulla Pidhaa Ennai Anuppinadhupolavum, Naan Pidhaavinaal Pizhaiththirukkiradhupolavum, Ennaip Pusikkiravanum Ennaale Pizhaippaan.
58 vaanaththilirundhirangina Appam Idhuve; Idhu Ungal Pidhaakkal Pusiththamannaavaip Polalla, Avargal Mariththaargale; Indha Appaththaip Pusikkiravano Endrendraikkum Pizhaippaan Endraar.
59 kapparnakoomilulla Jebaaalayaththile Avar Ubadhesikkaiyil Ivaigalai Sonnaar.
60 avarudaiya Seesharil Anegar Ivaigalaik Kettapozhudhu, Idhu Kadinamaana Ubadhesam, Yaar Idhaik Ketpaargal Endraargal.
61 seeshargal Adhaikkuriththu Murumurukkiraargalendru Yesu Thamakkulle Arindhu, Avargalai Nokki: Idhu Ungalukku Idaralaayirukkiradho?
62 manushakumaaran Thaam Munnirundha Idaththirku Erippogiradhai Neengal Kaanbeergalaanaal Eppadiyirukkum?
63 aaviye Uyirppikkiradhu, Maamsamaanadhu Ondrukkum Udhavaadhu; Naan Ungalukku Sollugira Vasanangal Aaviyaayum Jeevanaayum Irukkiradhu.
64 aagilum Ungalil Visuvaasiyaadhavargal Silar Undu Endraar; Visuvaasiyaadhavargal Innaarendrum, Thammaik Kaattikkoduppavan Innaanendrum Aadhimudhalaaga Yesu Arindhirundhapadiyaal, Avar Pinnum:
65 oruvan En Pidhaavin Arulaip Peraavittaal Ennidaththirku Varamaattaan Endru Idhinimiththame Ungalukku Sonnen Endraar.
66 adhumudhal Avarudaiya Seesharil Anegar Avarudanekooda Nadavaamal Pinvaangipponaargal.
67 appozhudhu Yesu Panniruvaraiyum Nokki: Neengalum Poivida Manadhaayirukkireergalo Endraar.
68 seemon Pedhuru Avarukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Aandavare, Yaaridaththil Povom, Niththiyajeeva Vasanangal Ummidaththil Unde.
69 neer Jeevanulla Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Kristhu Endru Naangal Visuvaasiththum Arindhum Irukkirom Endraan.
70 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Panniruvaraagiya Ungalai Naan Therindhukollavillaiyaa? Ungalukkullum Oruvan Pisaasaayirukkiraan Endraar.
71 seemonin Kumaaranaagiya Yoodhaaskaariyoththu Panniruvariloruvanaayirundhum, Thammaik Kaattikkodukkappogiravanaayirundhapadiyinaal Avanaik Kuriththu Ippadi Sonnaar.
